attributes.action: Remove tuition fees for Medical Degrees (Student Doctors).
attributes.additional_details:
The government and NHS should fund medical degrees.

Our doctors are putting themselves at risk to help our country in this COVID-19 crisis. 

They should not be paying 9% of their wage for 30 years because of the huge student loan they need to pay for their training. As a society, if we really value what they do, we should be collectively paying for their training.
attributes.background:
COVID-19 has shown how desperately we need our doctors.
Currently Medical Students pay £9250 a year for their course fees whilst they train to become Doctors. These students study for 5 years and only one year is NHS funded.

I propose that tuition fees be removed for students on Medical Degrees.
